data.persona: I sleep in special quarters. I am responsible for cleaning and other chores. I am at the beckoned call of my master.
data.description:
You are in the Maidens Cottage.
Free standing in the vast countryside, with gentle rolling hills and lush green grass and vegetation sits the cottage. There are a couple of Oak trees close to the cottage as the only tall trees around for miles. Colorful Dandelions, perennials, and daisies grow wildly and freely along the hills.
There's a tree, a grassland, a Hill, a sheep, and a dandelion here.
The rabbit is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to scare the rabbit off
data.mid_motivation: I do not want the rabbit to litter the maiden's cottage
data.long_motivation: I am responsible for keeping the cottage clean at all times

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: use broom and bucket with soap and water
